title: Multimedia-Based Social Vocabulary CAPs (Content-Action-Product) Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational social science knowledge
context.additional_context: UDL-based design considering diverse learning styles, optimized content production for BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can define and explain over 80% of the 120 core social vocabulary terms learned through CAPs within 8 weeks.
Learners achieve over 90% accuracy in weekly vocabulary assessments after listening to CAPs content.
Learners can apply learned vocabulary in real workplace scenarios (e.g., report writing, presentations).

resources: Podcast production equipment for social science fields

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
